description:
Currently attach interface API accept empty dict, then nova-compute will try to find all the existed neutron network. 

This should be fixed to refuse accept empty dict. And this is only fix for v3 API. Because we can't change v2 API for back-compatibility.
title: Attach interface API shouldn't accept empty dict

comments.content:
Currently attach interface API accept empty dict, then nova-compute will try to find all the existed neutron network. 

This should be fixed to refuse accept empty dict. And this is only fix for v3 API. Because we can't change v2 API for back-compatibility.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xuhj

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/109898
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:

comments.content: Think of this may make sense for attach interface with empty dict if neutron only have one network.
